name: sveltekit-starter
description: A sveltekit starter project with typescript, tailwindcss, postcss, scss, husky, and storybook setup

scripts.dev:postcss:tailwindcss: cross-env STYLE_TYPE=TAILWIND TAILWIND_MODE=build postcss src/styles/tailwind.postcss -o static/tailwind.css -w
scripts.dev: npm run check-env && npm run add-css && npm run dev:sveltekit
scripts.dev:host: npm run check-env && npm run add-css && npm run dev:sveltekit:host
scripts.build:postcss: cross-env TAILWIND_MODE=build NODE_ENV=production cross-env-shell postcss static/global.css -o static/global.css
scripts.build:postcss:taildwindcss: cross-env TAILWIND_MODE=build NODE_ENV=production STYLE_TYPE=TAILWIND postcss src/styles/tailwind.postcss -o static/tailwind.css
scripts.build: run-s remove-css build:env:prod build:scss build:postcss build:postcss:taildwindcss build:sveltekit build:env:local
scripts.build:static: cross-env ADAPTER=static OPTIONS='{}' npm run build
scripts.build:node: cross-env ADAPTER=node OPTIONS='{}' npm run build
scripts.build:netlify: cross-env ADAPTER=netlify OPTIONS='{}' npm run build
scripts.build:vercel: cross-env ADAPTER=vercel OPTIONS='{}' npm run build
scripts.build:static:verbose: cross-env ADAPTER=static OPTIONS='{}' npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:node:verbose: cross-env ADAPTER=node OPTIONS='{}' npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:netlify:verbose: cross-env ADAPTER=netlify OPTIONS='{}' npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:vercel:verbose: cross-env ADAPTER=vercel OPTIONS='{}' npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:static:ssr: cross-env ADAPTER=static OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true npm run build
scripts.build:node:ssr: cross-env ADAPTER=node OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true npm run build
scripts.build:netlify:ssr: cross-env ADAPTER=netlify OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true npm run build
scripts.build:vercel:ssr: cross-env ADAPTER=vercel OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true npm run build
scripts.build:static:verbose:ssr: cross-env ADAPTER=static OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:node:verbose:ssr: cross-env ADAPTER=node OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:netlify:verbose:ssr: cross-env ADAPTER=netlify OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:vercel:verbose:ssr: cross-env ADAPTER=vercel OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:static:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=static OPTIONS='{}' AMP=true npm run build
scripts.build:node:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=node OPTIONS='{}' AMP=true npm run build
scripts.build:netlify:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=netlify OPTIONS='{}' AMP=true npm run build
scripts.build:vercel:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=vercel OPTIONS='{}' AMP=true npm run build
scripts.build:static:verbose:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=static OPTIONS='{}' AMP=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:node:verbose:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=node OPTIONS='{}' AMP=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:netlify:verbose:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=netlify OPTIONS='{}' AMP=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:vercel:verbose:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=vercel OPTIONS='{}' AMP=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:static:ssr:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=static OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true AMP=true npm run build
scripts.build:node:ssr:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=node OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true AMP=true npm run build
scripts.build:netlify:ssr:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=netlify OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true AMP=true npm run build
scripts.build:vercel:ssr:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=vercel OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true AMP=true npm run build
scripts.build:static:verbose:ssr:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=static OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true AMP=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:node:verbose:ssr:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=node OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true AMP=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:netlify:verbose:ssr:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=netlify OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true AMP=true npm run build:verbose
scripts.build:vercel:verbose:ssr:amp: cross-env ADAPTER=vercel OPTIONS='{}' SSR=true AMP=true npm run build:verbose
